name: Prodigy Game Like Educational Game Demo
name_original: Prodigy Game Like Educational Game Demo
description:
I put up a demo project mimics the Prodigy math game.

Prodigy is one of the world’s most fun and engaging massively multiplayer online role-playing games (MMORPG) focused on driving student outcomes in math through game-based learning.  

Research has found in-game feedback can help to motivate students (Faber, Luyten & Visscher, 2017). This is precisely the formula Prodigy uses to assess student performance, determine appropriate content, and provide actionable real-time data to teachers. https://www.prodigygame.com/main-en/blog/is-prodigy-math-adaptive/

For more information:

https://www.prodigygame.com/main-en/prodigy-math/
